propose.from sentence: In this paper we propose a novel class of memory augmented neural networks called Neural Semantic Encoders (NSE) for natural language understanding.

variable sized encoding memory.from sentence: NSE has a variable sized encoding memory which allows the model to access entire input sequence during the reading process; therefore efficiently delivering long-term dependencies over time.

evolves.from sentence: The encoding memory evolves over time and maintains the memory of the input sequence through read, compose and write operations.

sequentially processes.from sentence: NSE sequentially processes the input and supports word compositionality inheriting both temporal and hierarchical nature of human language.

supports.from sentence: NSE sequentially processes the input and supports word compositionality inheriting both temporal and hierarchical nature of human language.

read from and write to: set of relevant encoding memories simultaneously

read from and write to.from sentence: NSE can read from and write to a set of relevant encoding memories simultaneously or multiple NSEs can access a shared encoding memory effectively supporting knowledge and representation sharing.

access.from sentence: NSE can read from and write to a set of relevant encoding memories simultaneously or multiple NSEs can access a shared encoding memory effectively supporting knowledge and representation sharing.
